definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to walk (side part of split character)
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
to be far from/to keep away from
long-term/at a fixed date in the future (e.g. for repayment)/abbr. for 遠期合約|远期合约[yuan3 qi1 he2 yue1]
distant seas/the open ocean (far from the coast)

sentences.english: This event long antedates the arrival of Columbus in America.
sentences.chinese: 这件事的发生远在哥伦布到达美洲之前。

sentences.english: But there is more to writing a good cover letter.
sentences.chinese: 但是想要写出一封精彩的求职信远没有这么简单。

sentences.english: Rwanda is far from fully recovered.
sentences.chinese: 卢旺达离完全恢复还很远。

sentences.english: You can keep going long after you think you canno…
sentences.chinese: 在想过不能之后，你会走的更远。

sentences.english: One day is hardly enough to show our gratitude。
sentences.chinese: 仅这一天远不足以表达我们对您的感激之情。

sentences.english: For less than one year old, he left the parents to the far far away a place of living.
sentences.chinese: 未足一岁，便离开了父母，到很远很远的地方生活。

sentences.english: For less than one year old, he left the parents to the far far away a place of living.
sentences.chinese: 未足一岁，便离开了父母，到很远很远的地方生活。

sentences.english: The men rippled farther outward, lighting lanterns and moving into the gorge.
sentences.chinese: 人们向更远的地方找去，点起了灯笼，走进了峡谷。

sentences.english: The sea, at certain parts of the coast, goes out so far that it can no longer be seen.
sentences.chinese: 沿海有些地带，潮落时海水退得很远，连望都望不到。

sentences.english: Very far away from the juvenile Teacher decades have not seen a few noodle.
sentences.chinese: 老师离少年很远，几十年也没见过几面。

sentences.english: The audio book with a live goose, Donglai not far from Penglai.
sentences.chinese: 好把音书凭过雁，东莱不似蓬莱远。

sentences.english: Beyong her and far below is an immense rocky landscape.
sentences.chinese: 在离她更远更深的地方是一片巨大的岩石风景。

sentences.english: We had not gone far before we saw the road blocked by a truck.
sentences.chinese: 我们还没走多远就看见路被一辆卡车挡住了。

sentences.english: I must wonder how far is too far when venturing into a virtual reality.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道当冒险进入虚拟现实时走多远才算可以？

sentences.english: Last night, I dream, you dreamed of a long run, how to catch up with recovery.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚做梦，梦到你跑的好远，怎么追也追不上。

sentences.english: How can the earth pull on something from a distance, that it’s not even attached to?
sentences.chinese: 地球是怎样隔着这么远“拉”动物体的呢？

definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
to fall short of/not as good as/too late
